heading: Change PIN
paragraph: For security reasons, customers can change their PIN at any time with no cost. From the Kaashplus menu select 'My Account'. Select 'Change PIN'. Enter old PIN press OK. Enter new PIN and confirm it. Wait for the confirmation.

heading: Language
paragraph: You can choose. From the Kaash Plus menu select 'My account'. Select 'Language'. Choose from Somali or English. Language successfully changed.

heading: Report Lost
paragraph: You can report Kaash Plus if your mobile is lost:From the Kaash Plus menu select “My account”Select “Report Lost”.Enter Lost Number.Enter Lost number PIN Successful reported.
